<title level="2" right="Creature 9">[Keznin Nevarmo](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1646)</title>

<trait label="Medium" />

<trait label="Tengu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=240" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Night of the Gray Death](/Sources.aspx?ID=99) pg. 8</row>

**Perception** +18; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Elven](/Languages.aspx?ID=4), [Tengu](/Languages.aspx?ID=47)

**Skills**
[Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +18, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +17, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +21, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +17, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +19, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +17

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +3

**Con** +0

**Int** +4

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +3
</row>

**Expert Herbalist** Keznin can use Nature instead of Medicine to [Treat Disease](/Actions.aspx?ID=55), [Treat Poison](/Actions.aspx?ID=56), and [Treat Wounds](/Actions.aspx?ID=57), and he can use Nature instead of Crafting to craft alchemical items with the healing trait, [antidote](/Equipment.aspx?ID=80), and [antiplagues](/Equipment.aspx?ID=81).

**Items**
[Healer's Tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=25), [Antidote](/Equipment.aspx?ID=80) (2), [Antiplague](/Equipment.aspx?ID=81) (2), [Elixir of Life](/Equipment.aspx?ID=91) (2), [religious symbol](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41) of [Pharasma](/Deities.aspx?ID=14)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 26 

**Fort** +15 

**Ref** +18 

**Will** +21 

</row>

**HP** 150

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
beak +19 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d6+4 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
staff +16 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [two-hand d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)),
**Damage** 1d4+4 bludgeoning

**Risky Treatment** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Fortune](/Traits.aspx?ID=76), [Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Trigger** Keznin rolls a critical failure on a check to [Treat Disease](/Actions.aspx?ID=55), [Treat Poison](/Actions.aspx?ID=56), or [Treat Wounds](/Actions.aspx?ID=57); **Effect** Keznin gives an emergency application of dangerous herbs to avert further harm. The creature Keznin is treating takes 2d6 poison damage, and Keznin rerolls the check.

</column>
